description.displayText: She was phenomenal! She helped so much after this past year that made going to work, and having kids much easier. My husband and I both work and she was able to stay with the kids and help them with their homework. We wanted a babysitter that spoke a second language so we could get a head start for them and Ashley was perfect. At the time she just started college, so I could only imagine what more she could do now. I never had to worry if anything went wrong with our kids because she was always on call and communicative. Our kids love her.
